name: Fastmail MCP Server
description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides AI assistants with secure, read-only access to your Fastmail email account via the JMAP API. Search emails by text or sender, read full email content with attachments, and list all mailboxes with unread counts.
examples: Search my inbox for emails from John
Show me my recent unread emails
List all my mailboxes and their unread counts
Find emails about the project deadline
Get the full content of that email
Check if I have any emails from support@company.com

tools.name: search_emails
tools.description: Search emails by text query across subject, body, and sender fields. Filter by mailbox and limit results.

tools.name: get_email
tools.description: Retrieve the full content of a specific email including body text, metadata, and attachment information.

tools.name: list_mailboxes
tools.description: List all mailboxes/folders in the account with total and unread email counts.

prompts.name: check_inbox
prompts.description: Check your inbox for the most recent emails.

prompts.name: search_from_sender
prompts.description: Search for all emails from a specific sender.

prompts.name: check_unread
prompts.description: Check which mailboxes have unread emails.

prompts.name: find_attachments
prompts.description: Find emails with attachments about a specific topic.

resources.description: List of all mailboxes in the Fastmail account with email counts.
